query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN eventDurationMode ENUM('stop_only', 'include_drive') DEFAULT 'stop_only',
ADD COLUMN googleCalendarAccessToken TEXT,
ADD COLUMN googleCalendarRefreshToken TEXT,
ADD COLUMN googleCalendarTokenExpiry TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN googleCalendarList TEXT,
ADD COLUMN calendarPreferences TEXT,
ADD COLUMN autoArchiveDays INT,
ADD COLUMN schedulingEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN enableDateReminders INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN reminderIntervals TEXT,
ADD COLUMN enabledReminderDateTypes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail30DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail30DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail30DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail10DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail10DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail10DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail5DaysSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail5DaysBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmail5DaysBodyTeam TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmailPastDueSubject TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmailPastDueBodyContact TEXT,
ADD COLUMN reminderEmailPastDueBodyTeam TEXT;
